transcript: most entrepreneurs spend all their time doing is adding potential to the system but not adding throughput they work on the stuff they like the most not the stuff they need the most on the inside you feel like you always know what your constraint is and so having external eyes to be like dude that's not the problem I know you love writing copies I know you love hopping on sales calls I know you love drilling the team whatever it is but usually the thing they like the most isn't the constraints the strongest part of the business you're doing the same thing you're not growing you're doing the wrong stuff
